verses.verse: <S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G67>Agrippa<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, <S%G4671>Thou<s%> art <S%G2010>permitted<s%> to <S%G3004>speak<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%>. <S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> stretched <S%G1614>forth<s%> the <S%G5495>hand<s%>, and answered for <S%G626>himself<s%>:

I <S%G2233>think<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> <S%G3107>happy<s%>, <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G67>Agrippa<s%>, because I <S%G3195>shall<s%> answer for <S%G626>myself<s%> this <S%G4594>day<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%> <S%G4012>touching<s%> all the <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G3739>whereof<s%> I am <S%G1458>accused<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>:

<S%G3122>Especially<s%> because I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> to <S%G5607>be<s%> <S%G1109%G5037>expert<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1485>customs<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2213>questions<s%> which are <S%G2596>among<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>: <S%G1352>wherefore<s%> I <S%G1189>beseech<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G3450>me<s%> <S%G3116>patiently<s%>.

<S%G3450>My<s%> <S%G3303%G3767>manner<s%> of <S%G981>life<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> my <S%G3503>youth<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G575>at<s%> the <S%G746>first<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3450>mine<s%> own <S%G1484>nation<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G2467>know<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>;

Which <S%G4267>knew<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> from the <S%G509>beginning<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> they <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3140>testify<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the most <S%G196>straitest<s%> <S%G139>sect<s%> of <S%G2251>our<s%> <S%G2356>religion<s%> I <S%G2198>lived<s%> a <S%G5330>Pharisee<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> I <S%G2476>stand<s%> and am <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of the <S%G1860>promise<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> our <S%G3962>fathers<s%>:

<S%G1519>Unto<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> promise <S%G2257>our<s%> twelve <S%G1429>tribes<s%>, <S%G1722%G1616>instantly<s%> <S%G3000>serving<s%> God <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%>, <S%G1679>hope<s%> to <S%G2658>come<s%>. <S%G4012>For<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> hope's <S%G1680>sake<s%>, <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G67>Agrippa<s%>, I am <S%G1458>accused<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>.

<S%G5101>Why<s%> should it be thought a <S%G2919>thing<s%> <S%G571>incredible<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G1487>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> should <S%G1453>raise<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>?

<S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3303%G3767>verily<s%> <S%G1380>thought<s%> with <S%G1683>myself<s%>, that I <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G4238>do<s%> many <S%G4183>things<s%> <S%G1727>contrary<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3480>Nazareth<s%>.

Which <S%G3739>thing<s%> <S%G4160>I<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> of the <S%G40>saints<s%> <S%G2623>did<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> shut <S%G2623>up<s%> in <S%G5438>prison<s%>, having <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests<s%>; <S%G5037>and<s%> when <S%G846>they<s%> were put to <S%G337>death<s%>, I <S%G2702>gave<s%> my <S%G5586>voice<s%> against them.

<S%G2532>And<s%> I <S%G5097>punished<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4178>oft<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4864>synagogue<s%>, and <S%G315>compelled<s%> them to <S%G987>blaspheme<s%>; <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G1693>being<s%> <S%G4057>exceedingly<s%> mad <S%G1693>against<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, I <S%G1377>persecuted<s%> them <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G1519%G2193>unto<s%> <S%G1854>strange<s%> <S%G4172>cities<s%>.

<S%G2532><s%><S%G1722%G3739>Whereupon<s%> as I <S%G4198>went<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1154>Damascus<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2011>commission<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests<s%>,

At <S%G2250%G3319>midday<s%>, O <S%G935>king<s%>, I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> a <S%G5457>light<s%> from <S%G3771>heaven<s%>, <S%G5228>above<s%> the <S%G2987>brightness<s%> of the <S%G2246>sun<s%>, shining round <S%G4034>about<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> them which <S%G4198>journeyed<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when <S%G2257>we<s%> <S%G2667>were<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2667>fallen<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G2980>speaking<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> in the <S%G1446>Hebrew<s%> <S%G1258>tongue<s%>, <S%G4549>Saul<s%>, <S%G4549>Saul<s%>, <S%G5101>why<s%> persecutest <S%G1377>thou<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>? it is <S%G4642>hard<s%> for <S%G4671>thee<s%> to <S%G2979>kick<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> the <S%G2759>pricks<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G5101>Who<s%> art <S%G1488>thou<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>? <S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G1377>persecutest<s%>.

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G450>rise<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> I have <S%G3700>appeared<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> this <S%G5124>purpose<s%>, to <S%G4400>make<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> a <S%G5257>minister<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G3144>witness<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> of these things <S%G3739>which<s%> thou hast <S%G1492>seen<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> of those things in the <S%G3739>which<s%> I will <S%G3700>appear<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%>;

<S%G1807>Delivering<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> from the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>, <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> I <S%G649>send<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>,

To <S%G455>open<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%>, and to <S%G1994>turn<s%> them <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G4655>darkness<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5457>light<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> from the <S%G1849>power<s%> of <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, that <S%G846>they<s%> may <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G859>forgiveness<s%> of <S%G266>sins<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2819>inheritance<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> them which are <S%G37>sanctified<s%> by <S%G4102>faith<s%> that is <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%>.
<S%G3606>Whereupon<s%>, O <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G67>Agrippa<s%>, I <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G545>disobedient<s%> unto the <S%G3770>heavenly<s%> <S%G3701>vision<s%>:

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G518%G518>shewed<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> unto them <S%G1722>of<s%> <S%G1154>Damascus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> at <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G1519>throughout<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G5561>coasts<s%> of <S%G2449>Judaea<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> then to the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>, that they should <S%G3340>repent<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1994>turn<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, and <S%G4238>do<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G514>meet<s%> for <S%G3341>repentance<s%>.
<S%G1752>For<s%> these <S%G5130>causes<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G4815>caught<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%>, and went <S%G3987>about<s%> to <S%G1315>kill<s%> me.

<S%G5177>Having<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5177>obtained<s%> <S%G1947>help<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, I <S%G2476>continue<s%> <S%G891>unto<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>, <S%G3140>witnessing<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> to <S%G3398>small<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%> none other <S%G3762>things<s%> <S%G1622>than<s%> those <S%G3739%G5037>which<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> did <S%G2980>say<s%> <S%G3195>should<s%> <S%G1096>come<s%>:

<S%G1487>That<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> should <S%G3805>suffer<s%>, and <S%G1487>that<s%> he should be the <S%G4413>first<s%> that should <S%G386>rise<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>, and <S%G3195>should<s%> <S%G2605>shew<s%> <S%G5457>light<s%> unto the <S%G2992>people<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> as <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G5023>thus<s%> spake for <S%G626>himself<s%>, <S%G5347>Festus<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%>, <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, thou art beside <S%G3105>thyself<s%>; <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G1121>learning<s%> doth <S%G4062>make<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G1519%G3130>mad<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> he <S%G5346>said<s%>, I <S%G3105>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3105>mad<s%>, most <S%G2903>noble<s%> <S%G5347>Festus<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> speak <S%G669>forth<s%> the <S%G4487>words<s%> of <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4997>soberness<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G1987>knoweth<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> things, <S%G4314>before<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> I <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G3955>freely<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> I am <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> <S%G3756>that<s%> <S%G5100%G3762>none<s%> of these <S%G5130>things<s%> are <S%G2990>hidden<s%> from <S%G846>him<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> this <S%G5124>thing<s%> <S%G2076>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4238>done<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G1137>corner<s%>.
<S%G935>King<s%> <S%G67>Agrippa<s%>, believest <S%G4100>thou<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%>? I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> thou <S%G4100>believest<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G67>Agrippa<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, <S%G1722%G3641>Almost<s%> thou <S%G3982>persuadest<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> to <S%G1096>be<s%> a <S%G5546>Christian<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, I <S%G302%G2172>would<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%>, that <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G4571>thou<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G3450>me<s%> this <S%G4594>day<s%>, <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G1722%G3641>almost<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722%G4183>altogether<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G3697%G2504>as<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%>, <S%G3924>except<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G1199>bonds<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2036>had<s%> <S%G5023>thus<s%> <S%G2036>spoken<s%>, the <S%G935>king<s%> rose <S%G450>up<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2232>governor<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G959>Bernice<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they that sat <S%G4775>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> when they were gone <S%G402>aside<s%>, they <S%G2980>talked<s%> <S%G4314>between<s%> <S%G240>themselves<s%>, <S%G3004%G3754>saying<s%>, <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G4238>doeth<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> of <S%G1199>bonds<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> <S%G67>Agrippa<s%> unto <S%G5347>Festus<s%>, <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1410>might<s%> have been set at <S%G630>liberty<s%>, <S%G1508>if<s%> he <S%G1941>had<s%> <S%G1508>not<s%> appealed <S%G1941>unto<s%> <S%G2541>Caesar<s%>.
